rules_text:
When this creature enters, choose one –
• Put up to one target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard on top of your library.
• Seize The Core. [i](Get {E} or surveil 1. A player with the core seizes it at their upkeep. Unblocked creatures seize the core.)[/i]
notes:
!addtoken Energy Reserve; The Core;
!token Energy Reserve VRN; The Core VRN;
